module.name: Fast Agi
module.changelog: *4.1.0 Support du popover de FreePBX 2.11 *4.0.0* Passage en V4. Permet aussi le changement de CallerIDName et NUM *0.1.0* Creation
module.description: Go call to FastAgi, if fast agi is not present go to failover, if fast agi return goes to normal destination.
